title: Grand Hyatt Xi'an
content:
To.Grand Hyatt Xi'an 
I came to Xi'an for a business trip. 
I was very satisfied with my hotel life. 
I recommend Grand Hyatt Xi'an to a family member, friend.
I was touched by the kindness of an employee named Grace.
I'm going to visit again.

i stayed in here for 2month, in executive lounge The hotel staff is so kind and nice that I will definitely come here again next time. (her name is Chloe) i recommend this hotel and lounge!

content:
